title: What's the current policy on content transfering bewteen accounts?
body: So I have two accounts, both of which I've bought a significant ammount of RP with, my main account however, is in NA, while the other one is in LAN, because I don't quite enjoy playing in LAN other than ocassinally with some friends, I would much rather just transfer most of the stuff I have in that account to my main one. I would imagine that it should already be hard enough to get stuff transferred between accounts, and even harder if it's beteen regions, because of the different prices, but I figured I would give it a shot anyways. I'll await an answer and thanks in advance.

replies.body: Their policy is a firmly planted "no" to all the above, unless they've changed it in the last year or so (unlikely for this kind of thing). There's just so many incredibly easy ways this kind of service could go horribly wrong, both for Riot and the players.

Transferring content between accounts has historically been a pretty firm "no" like KattzKitti said. It can cause a huge variety of issues on all ends. With that being said, it never hurts to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you feel like your situation is rather unique. We're always willing to try and help out when it's in player's best interest.

Well, I don't think my situation is anything other than "I just don't want to have hundreds of dollars worth of stuff on two different accounts" so not really that unique. That being said it was worth a shot. Anyways, thanks for the answer.
